availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Biddle (Bracken and Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Bracken and Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Clark County, Kentucky, native. Son of Caleb Biddle and Sarah Biddle. Married to Margaret Cummins Biddle in Pendleton County, Kentucky, on April 20, 1852. Father of William J. Biddle, Sanford Biddle, Alice Biddle, Dawson Biddle, and Cora Biddle. Resident of Bracken County in 1850. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 424B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 661.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Precinct No. 3, p. 426A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Pendleton County, KY, June and July 1863.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994052, Pendleton County Marriages.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film #000272807.
